The Rills0696003tb0dpnhfcur5ae3wwm06e3720r7l91604182014-09-24T19:40:20ZThe Dragon Demands5014364[[Image:The Rills Pin.png|200px|thumb|right|A map showing the location of the Rills on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''The Rills''' are a region along the west coast of [[the North]], west of the [[Barrowlands]] and southwest of [[Winterfell]]. The [[Stony Shore]] forms the coast of the region, while the [[Wolfswood]] and [[Sea Dragon Point]] are located to the north. [[Blazewater Bay]] is to the south.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/torrhens-square/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Torrhen's Square entry]</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Rills are a region of hills, lakes and rivers south-west of [[Torrhen's Square]] and north-west of [[Barrowton]]. [[House Ryswell]] holds the Rills for the [[House Stark|Starks]] of Winterfell.

The Ryswells are noted for their honor. According to legend, a previous lord of the Rills arrested his own son for deserting the [[Night's Watch]], returning him to [[the Wall]] for trial and execution. The same lord later took the black himself to help amend for his son's treachery.
